Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted near 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, 67th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #60 Blue Island Reroute near Blue Island
ShortDescription: Westbound 60 Blue Island buses are temp. rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California and 26th street: due to street blockage near Blue Island/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California, 26th street and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Blue Island/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the track.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the track.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#205 Chicago/Golf

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Howard and Linden in both directions.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
